__TOC__

<nowiki>[[Zope-Maverick]]</nowiki> packages were late for feature freeze, but they are ready now. <nowiki>[[https://mail.zope.org/pipermail/zope-announce/2010-October/002251.html|Zope Toolkit 1.0 was released]]</nowiki>, and that's what we have packaged. Now we need to upload all of them to Natty.

=== Sponsoring ===

Packages for Natty are made available in <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~schooltool-owners/+archive/ppa/+packages?field.series_filter=natty|SchoolTool PPA]]</nowiki>. Sponsors, please take them from there. Because there are so many packages and they all are simple and similar, it was agreed to be impractical to go through REVU.

In addition, packaging branches are available at https://code.launchpad.net/~menesis/

=== Status ===

All needed Zope and Community packages have been added to Natty universe.

See SchoolTool packaging <nowiki>[[http://ftp.schooltool.org/schooltool/trunk/overview.txt|overview]]</nowiki>, updated nightly, for complete status of all involved packages.
